1.title: Level 1: HTML Structure Basics
1.paragraph: This level covers the fundamental elements of an HTML page: the <!DOCTYPE>, <html>, <head>, and <body> tags. Understanding this foundation is crucial before adding content.

2.title: Level 2: Text Formatting & Semantics
2.paragraph:

3.title: Level 3: Links and Navigation
3.paragraph: Master the anchor tag (<a>) to create internal and external links. We'll cover attributes like href, target, and the basics of relative vs. absolute paths.

4.title: Level 4: Images and Media
4.paragraph: This final section focuses on integrating visual content using the tag. You'll learn about src, alt text (for accessibility), and basic image sizing.
